vendor_name: TreeHouse Villas Koh Yao Noi Luxury Resort
title: Thailand Five-Star Island Pool Villas near Phuket with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Roundtrip Speedboat Transfers
description:
Experience a five-star, adults-only escape like no other at the TreeHouse Villas, perfectly set on Koh Yao Noi, between Phuket and Krabi and accessible only by speedboat. Ranked in the top 10% of resorts worldwide and stamped with Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2021 - ranked within the top 1% of the world, this secluded retreat has been expertly crafted for honeymooners, romantics and those who seek out unique stays. Live like royalty in truly palatial luxury, with each villa boasting its own dining area, day beds, hammock bath and private plunge pool. Each signature villa is masterfully nestled between lush trees to give the feeling of floating above the canopy, and at night, take in stunning sunset vistas from the comfort of your personal balcony.

Spend time by the boundless infinity pool or the adjoining waterfall grotto, stretch out with a yoga class, roll up your sleeves with a cooking class or rent a mountain bike and explore the pristine natural island wonderland (surcharges apply). Foodies will be delighted by flavoursome Thai fare at Roots Restaurant & Lounge, authentic Italian at Al Fresco restaurant, or extraordinary local produce at the open-air Seafood Terrace. If your idea of a perfect tropical escape involves a soothing massage or a heavenly treatment, drop into Serenity Spa and be pampered while listening to the soothing sounds of waves lapping against the shore.
offer_address: 24/21 Ko Yao Noi, Ko Yao District, 82160, Thailand

vendor_name: TreeHouse Villas Koh Yao Noi Luxury Resort
title: Beachfront Tree House Escape with Gourmet Dining & Island Transfers
description:
The coolest boutique resort in Thailand is back on Luxury Escapes: experience an adults-only eco-escape like no other, staying in a romantic tree house villa amid the jungle canopy of Thailand’s Koh Yao Noi island. Unwind with a tranquil treetop escape at TreeHouse Villas, only a 50-minute speedboat ride from Phuket - with return airport to island transfers included.

Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one Koh Yao traditional set Thai lunch or dinner for two, a 60-minute aromatherapy massage and 30-minute herbal steam per person, one half-day snorkelling boat trip for two and an introductory yoga session.

vendor_name: The Paradise Koh Yao Resort and Spa

description: A secluded sanctuary tucked away on the northeastern tip of Koh Yao island, Paradise Koh Yao Resort is the perfect escape for anyone yearning for a waterfront hideaway - just a scenic speedboat ride away from Phuket through the world-famous limestone karsts of Phang Nga Bay. Offering the best of everything from a yoga sampler to a 60-minute Thai massage each and a half-day shuttle exploration, unwind and savour the very best of an island escape as you're treated to daily buffet breakfast, a multi-course dining experience with drinks, a cocktail each, a beachside Thai cooking class, return airport transfers and so much more.

vendor_name: Cape Kudu Hotel, Koh Yao Noi
title: Five-Star Thailand Island Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Three-Course Dinner & Massages
description:
Picture yourself in tropical paradise, complete with decadent dining, refreshing cocktails and blissful massages. All this and more is yours at Cape Kudu Hotel - a luxurious resort on Koh Yao Noi. Perched on one of Thailand’s most tranquil islands, overlooking the sapphire waters of the Andaman Sea, this five-star boutique hotel epitomises island living, with activities for every type of escape. When not making use of the resort's extensive facilities, explore its surrounding rugged landscapes by bike, take to the water on a kayak or paddleboard, share a bottle of champagne at the moonlight cinema or hire the resort's private yacht for a day of indulgence.

Perfect for a romantic escape, this breathtaking abode boasts a collection of beach-inspired rooms and villas, an exclusive spa showcasing the latest treatments, and a glistening infinity pool with views across the sea and towering limestone cliffs.
location_description: Cape Kudu Hotel, Koh Yao Noi
offer_address: 25/54, 25/55 Moo 5, Koh Yao Noi Phang Nga 82160, Thailand

vendor_name: The Paradise Koh Yao Resort and Spa
title: Ultimate Island Paradise with Massages & Snorkeling Tour
description:
A secluded sanctuary tucked away on the northeastern tip of Koh Yao island, Paradise Koh Yao Resort - sister property of the renowned TreeHouse Villas Koh Yao Noi - is the perfect escape for couples and families yearning for a waterfront retreat. The resort is just a scenic speedboat ride away from Phuket through the world-famous limestone karsts of Phang Nga Bay. Settle into the rhythms of this barefoot island paradise and enjoy daily breakfast, one daily relaxing 30-minute massage per room, a half-day shuttle boat tour so you can swim and snorkel in the beautiful surrounding waters, a welcome juice each on arrival, a yoga session for two adults, a photo opportunity at TreeHouse Villas Koh Yao Noi and return land-and-boat airport transfers from Phuket.

**Travelling with Family?** Up to two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free (check individual packages for details).
offer_address: Ko Yao Noi island Amphoe Koh Yao Phuket and Krabi Phang-nga 82160, Thailand

vendor_name: The Paradise Koh Yao Resort and Spa
title: Boutique Thailand Island Paradise with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Tucked away on the northeastern tip of Koh Yao Noi island, within its own private bay, a barefoot island oasis awaits at Paradise KohYao. Brought to you by the team behind the renowned TreeHouse Villas Koh Yao Noi, this remote hideaway is an unspoiled island of near-deserted beaches and pristine forest overlooking the world-renowned Phang Nga Bay.

From lounging on the 400m private beachfront to kayaking and snorkelling through emerald green waters or dining at the two onsite restaurants and bars, this laidback honeymooners' retreat invites you to do as little or as much as you please in the uttermost privacy and seclusion.

vendor_name: Cape Kudu Hotel, Koh Yao Noi
title: Five-Star Thailand Island Paradise with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Picture yourself on an untouched tropical paradise, complete with decadent dining, refreshing cocktails and blissful massages - all this and more is at your fingertips at Cape Kudu Hotel, a luxurious resort on Koh Yao Noi. Perched on one of Thailand’s most tranquil islands, overlooking the sapphire waters of the Andaman Sea, this five-star boutique bolthole epitomises idyllic island living, with activities for every type of escape. When not indulging in the resort's extensive facilities, explore its rugged landscapes by bike, take to the water on a kayak or paddleboard, share a bottle of champagne at the moonlight cinema or hire the resort's private yacht for a day of indulgence.

Perfect for a couples' retreat or an unforgettable group escape, this breathtaking abode boasts an intimate collection of beach-inspired rooms and villas, an exclusive spa showcasing the latest treatments, and a glistening infinity pool with views across the Andaman Sea's towering limestone cliffs. Your tastebuds will want for nothing at Cape Kudu Hotel: dine on an ever-evolving menu of Thai delights at Hornbill Restaurant, snack and relax in a quiet corner at Café Kantary or bask in the sunset's golden glow with a cocktail in hand at Long Island Bar.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Days in paradise begin with **daily buffet breakfast** and Phang Nga Bay views at Hornbill Restaurant
- Toast your escape with one **nightly cocktail, beer, glass of wine or soft drink** each at Long Island Bar
- Enjoy a **one-time** **three-course set Thai dinner for two** (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Float away during a **60-minute massage per adult** at Cape Spa (for stays of 5+ nights)
- **THB6,300 resort credit** per room towards dining, spa treatments and more (for stays of 7+ nights)

**Travelling as a family or group?** Plunge into your choice of two luxurious swimming pools when you stay in Baan Yu Yen - an indulgent two-bedroom, two-bathroom villa which caters for up to five guests (charges apply for extra guests, see individual package for details).
offer_address: Tambon Ko Yao Noi, Chang Wat, Phang Nga, Thailand

vendor_name: TreeHouse Villas Koh Yao Noi Luxury Resort
title: Thailand Treehouse Pool Villa Escape
description:
Experience an adults-only eco-escape like no other, staying in a romantic beachfront treehouse villa at TreeHouse Villas. Sleep in your very own treehouse, nestled amid the jungle canopy of Koh Yao Noi - a dreamy Thai island easily reachable via a 50-minute speedboat ride from Phuket.

Regarded as one of Thailand’s last unspoiled islands, Koh Yao Noi is located within the famous Phang Nga Bay (between Phuket and Krabi). Here you’ll find pristine beaches and lush untouched jungle, as well as one of the most unique resorts in Asia. TreeHouse Villas will allow you to experience the magic of this island with its idyllic combination of sustainable eco-living and tropical island luxury. Unwind in style in your unique treehouse featuring an outdoor plunge pool that juts into the jungle and an open-air living space complete with daybeds and a double swing. The resort’s exquisite facilities include a blissful spa, three restaurants and bars, and a sparkling pool overlooking the beach.
offer_address: 24/21 Moo 4 Koh Yao Noi, Koh Yao Phang Nga 82160 Thailand
